items.summary: Add a backend scheduled process that runs every 10 minutes and automatically expires ShopUpdates: find all ShopUpdates where isActive == true and expiryDate <= current canister time, then set isActive = false and set expiredAt = current timestamp. Expired ShopUpdates must not be deleted.

Extend the backend ShopUpdate data model to store when an update was expired by adding an optional expiredAt field (null when not expired). Ensure any existing persisted ShopUpdates remain readable after upgrade and default to expiredAt = null if missing.

Ensure all backend APIs used for customer-facing feeds only return currently active, unexpired ShopUpdates (isActive == true AND expiryDate > current canister time), so expired updates are automatically removed from the Customer Home Feed without requiring frontend changes.
